title: Stair space

properties.name: description
properties.value: Stair space is a hotspot in the Skill Hall, Quest Hall, and Dungeon of a player-owned house that is only visible to the player when in building mode.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Stair space
Stair space
Released31 May 2006 (Update)
MembersYes
QuestNo
LocationPlayer-owned house (skill hall, quest hall, Dungeon)
OptionsBuild
ExamineYou can build stairs here.
Advanced data
Object ID15380, 15381, 15390, 15391

Stair space is a hotspot in the Skill Hall, Quest Hall, and Dungeon of a player-owned house that is only visible to the player when in building mode.

7 97 Marble spiral Teak plank x10
Marble block x7 		4,400 2,338,500
